titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1343) to provide Federal assistance to States and local jurisdictions to prosecute hate crimes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Conyers. Petition No: 107-12.

bill.summary: 9/9/2002--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 1343 (hate crimes prevention assistance).
